projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills, built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.

projects.title: E-Learning Platform
projects.description: A full-stack application for students and teachers to interact, manage courses, and schedule classes. Built using MERN stack.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A productivity app to manage daily tasks with features like deadlines, reminders, and categories, built with Next.js and TypeScript.

projects.title: E-Commerce Store
projects.description: An e-commerce store with features like product listings, shopping cart, and payments integration using Stripe.

projects.title: Blog Platform
projects.description: A platform for users to write and publish blog posts with features like user authentication, commenting, and tags.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: The Weather Project is a dynamic web application designed to provide users with real-time weather information for locations worldwide. Built using React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, the application offers an intuitive interface that allows users to search for any city and retrieve current weather conditions, including temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather forecasts.

projects.title: Food Plaza
projects.description: A simple and efficient website to find the best recipe for your taste buds!!!

projects.title: Currency Converter
projects.description: The Currency Converter project is a user-friendly web application built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. It allows users to seamlessly convert amounts between various currencies using real-time data from the CoinMarketCap API. With a clean and responsive design, the application features a simple interface where users can select their desired currencies and input the amount to be converted.

projects.title: StudyMate
projects.description: An incomplete project containing the UI elements of online study buddy platform
